string.value: You got #t4031569# from #p2100001#. Unlike other swords, this blade is dull, yet light and beautifully decorated. It should look good on #p2101000#.
After receiving the new sword, #p2101000# confidently declared she will one day perform in the castle. Will all this preparation, she should be accepted into the palace...
You're back. I'm just about done with the sword for #p2101000#. Take a look. It's more of an accessory than a sword, but for a dancer, this is the ultimate prop. Will you accept it?

#p2101000# is a smart young woman. She used the very first sword I made her for her very first dance. If not for the Queen's tyranny, I would've given her a sword as a gift. Please take this sword to #b#p2101000##k right now. Your kindess shall not go un-rewarded.
Are you busy with something? Sirin is waiting for her swordâ€¦
Did you go see #p2100001#? Did you get the fancy dancer sword for me? Wow! So these are the #t4031569#! Amazing!

Thank you! This will let me enter the castle with more pizzazz than anyone. I WILL enter the castle. I will be #p2101000#, the greatest dancer of #m260000000#, performing in front of the Sultan. You just wait and see!
You still haven't gone to #b#p2101000##k, yet? I'm sure she's eager to see the new sword... Please deliver these #t4031569# to #p2101000#.
You still haven't gone to #b#p2100001##k, yet? Find an old man who looks stubborn. His sword-making is the best in town, so ask him to make one for me.

What are you thinking? I took all that time and effort to make one for you, and you lose it? Good thing this person I knew picked it up and returned it to me... What would you do if that person didn't do that? Anyway, please give this to #b#p2101000##k.
